Introduction

Oh Se Hun is the lead dancer, lead rapper, and youngest member of the famous boy group EXO under SM Entertainment.

Sehun was only 12 when an SM Casting Manager approached him while he was having lunch with his friends. Thinking it was a scam, he ran away but was followed for about 30 minutes until he was finally convinced to audition. He became an official trainee in 2008 and made his official debut with EXO in 2012.

On July 22, 2019, Sehun debuted as a member of the group's sub-unit EXO-SC with the mini album "What a Life," alongside fellow member Chanyeol.

…
